announcements.title: Mid-Term Examinations Schedule
announcements.content: Mid-term examinations will be conducted from July 20-25, 2025. Please check your individual timetables for specific dates and timings.
announcements.author: Academic Office

announcements.title: Library Hours Extended
announcements.content: The library will remain open until 10:00 PM during exam period to provide students with additional study time.
announcements.author: Library Department

announcements.title: Assignment Submission Deadline
announcements.content: All pending assignments for DCN and ASSP subjects must be submitted by July 18, 2025. Late submissions will not be accepted.
announcements.author: Mr Wm Williamson

announcements.title: Guest Lecture on AI and Machine Learning
announcements.content: A special guest lecture on recent advances in AI and ML will be conducted on July 19, 2025 at 2:00 PM in the main auditorium.
announcements.author: Computer Science Department

announcements.title: Student Council Elections
announcements.content: Nominations for student council elections are now open. Submit your applications by July 22, 2025.
announcements.author: Student Affairs Office

announcements.title: Sports Day Registration
announcements.content: Annual sports day will be held on July 30, 2025. Register for various events at the sports office.
announcements.author: Sports Department

announcements.title: Placement Drive Notification
announcements.content: Several companies will be visiting for campus placements next month. Eligible students should register with the placement cell.
announcements.author: Placement Office

announcements.title: Workshop on Web Development
announcements.content: A hands-on workshop on modern web development technologies will be conducted over the weekend.
announcements.author: Mrs Tamara Dare
